items.title: Restraint of Appetite
items.challengeRule: No sugar or sweetened foods after dinner each day.

items.title: Restraint of Attention
items.challengeRule: No phone use after 8:00 PM each evening.

items.title: Order
items.challengeRule: Wake at the same time every day (Â±15 minutes), including weekends.

items.title: Silence
items.challengeRule: Ten minutes of intentional silence each day.

items.title: Intentional Eating
items.challengeRule: No snacking between meals; eat only at planned times.

items.title: Restraint of Speech
items.challengeRule: Speak with restraint; do not interrupt others.

items.title: Emotional Restraint
items.challengeRule: Do not complain verbally or internally.

items.title: Humility
items.challengeRule: Perform one hidden act of service each day without recognition.

items.title: Voluntary Discomfort
items.challengeRule: End each shower with a cold-water finish.

items.title: Sacrificial Priority (Temporary)
items.challengeRule: Wake 30 minutes earlier than normal this week only.

items.title: Mental Fast (Temporary)
items.challengeRule: No social media or streaming content this week.

items.title: Hidden Faithfulness
items.challengeRule: Do not tell anyone what you are doing during this final week.
